description: Ms. codex. Description based on Preliminary Checklist of Uncatalogued Islamic Manuscripts, Princeton University Library, 2013.
contents: leaves 1a-32a: Sharḥ arbaʻīn masʼalah li-Ibn al-Jazarī / Ibrāhīm al-Nishanjī.
leaves 32b-44a: Risālah fī al-masāʼil al-mutaʻalliqah bi-al-qirāʼāt.
